attributes.action: Access to free training for all UK citizens over the age of 60 on the use and limitations of Social Media
attributes.additional_details: We would like the goverment to make available free training sessions on the use and limitations of the various social media to all UK citizens over 60.

rejection.details: There are already sessions and courses provided by AgeUK which are tailored to the older person.  Also worth asking the Local Authority.
